content:
# The persistent issue with the player position being stuck at (0, 0) indicates that the movement commands are not functioning as intended. 
# This is preventing me from placing the stone furnace at any resource location.

# To troubleshoot this, I will first check my current position to confirm where I am located in the game world.

current_position = get_player_position()  # Get the current player position
print(f'Current player position: {current_position}')  # Display the current position of the player
